document.full_text: new photos from the first spacecraft to orbit mercury show the tiny planet has far more impressive battle scars from regular high-speed peltings by space rocks than does earth's moon.
document.title: video: first mercury images show lots of craters
lines_and_colors: new photos from the first spacecraft to orbit mercury show the tiny planet has far more impressive battle scars from regular high-speed peltings by space rocks than does earth's moon.
